document_data.caption: The [[leShay]] High Lady Ordalf (second from the right) announces the rebirth of [[Sarifal]], a [[fey]] kingdom in the [[Moonshae Isles|Moonshaes]] in the [[1375 DR|Year of Risen Elfkin]].
document_data.name: Ordalf
document_data.mainbody: '''High Lady Ordalf''' was the ruler of the [[fey]] kingdom of [[Sarifal]] on the isle of [[Gwynneth]] in the [[Moonshae Isles]], a rule that lasted over 11,000 years.
